name: Snapmaker Artisan
printer_notes: Snapmaker Artisan 3-in-1 with dual extruder support. 400x400x400mm build volume.

orcaslicer_settings.start_gcode:
G28 ; Home all axes
G1 Z5 F3000 ; Lift nozzle
M104 S[first_layer_temperature] ; Set nozzle temp
M140 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; Set bed temp
M190 S[first_layer_bed_temperature] ; Wait for bed
M109 S[first_layer_temperature] ; Wait for nozzle
G92 E0 ; Reset extruder
orcaslicer_settings.end_gcode:
G91 ; Relative positioning
G1 E-2 F2700 ; Retract
G1 Z10 F3000 ; Lift
G90 ; Absolute positioning
G28 X Y ; Home X and Y
M104 S0 ; Turn off hotend
M140 S0 ; Turn off bed
M84 ; Disable motors
